parameters.name: Includes
parameters.description: The directory in which the files included in the restoration task are located. This parameter is specified when you create the anti-ransomware policy. The value is a directory that requires protection.

parameters.name: SnapshotHash
parameters.description:
The hash value of the snapshot.

> You can call the [DescribeSnapshots](~~DescribeSnapshots~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description:
The ID of the snapshot that you want to use for restoration.

> You can call the [DescribeSnapshots](~~DescribeSnapshots~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: SnapshotVersion
parameters.description:
The version of the backup data.

> You can call the [DescribeSnapshots](~~DescribeSnapshots~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the data source. Valid values:

*   **ECS_FILE**: backup snapshots for Elastic Compute Service (ECS) files
*   **File**: backup snapshots for on-premises servers

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description: The path to which you want to restore data.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the server whose data you want to restore.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup vault that is used in the restoration task.

> You can call the [DescribeSnapshots](~~DescribeSnapshots~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.
